cyclone.name: CRISTOBAL
cyclone.current_location: about 50 mi (80 km) WSW of Campeche, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to meander over the southern Bay of Campeche through mid-week, then drift northward toward the central Gulf of Mexico late in the 5-day period
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern Bay of Campeche coast near Campeche/Tabasco, Mexico
